      • Condominium

        public Condominium(java.lang.Float[] sm,
                   int nFloors,
                   int nApartEachFloor,
                   java.lang.String name)
        Constructs and initializes the Condominium using input data
        Parameters:
        sm - Array containing the float values of the surface area of every apartment on the same floor
        nFloors - Number of floors
        nApartEachFloor - Number of apartments each floor
        name - Name of the condominium
